item.title: [REQ] Must be donator to use some items [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“pistolse, post:12, topic:278501”][quote author=xlxoxoxt link=topic=367615.msg2784805#msg2784805 date=1242426484]
if(wearID == 4153 && ispremium == false) {
sM(“You must Be a Premium Member to wear this item!”);
return false;
}
[/quote]

wtf wrong with you people? i’m fucking talking about donator i dont even have fucking premium dude gtfo the forumsu retarded fat piece of shit[/quote]
You have to use whatever variable you’ve declared, idiot. His was an example. If you don’t want help, get the hell out of here.

item.title: [REQ] Must be donator to use some items [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

In a 317, you would use playerEquipment[playerThing] (Thing being chest, plate, weapon, etc), or playerHasItem(int). Find out what those methods are in your source.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Must be donator to use some items [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

Not sure, do u have any idea what the rights is on delta?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 11:38:49 am[/size][hr]anyways maybe this will help, my adddonator command looks like this

[code] if (command.startsWith(“donatoradd”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
